Uses of Class
com.foreach.across.core.support.AcrossContextBuilder

  • Packages that use AcrossContextBuilder 
    Package Description
    com.foreach.across.core.support  

    • Uses of AcrossContextBuilder in com.foreach.across.core.support

      Methods in com.foreach.across.core.support that return AcrossContextBuilder 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      AcrossContextBuilder AcrossContextBuilder.additionalModulePackageClasses(Class<?>... classes)
      Type-safe alternative for additionalModulePackages(String...) where the packages of the classes will be added for module scanning.
      AcrossContextBuilder AcrossContextBuilder.additionalModulePackages(String... packageNames)
      Additional packages that should be scanned for modules if no custom ModuleDependencyResolver is configured.
      AcrossContextBuilder AcrossContextBuilder.applicationContext(org.springframework.context.ApplicationContext applicationContext)
      Set the parent ApplicationContext to be attached to the AcrossContext.
      AcrossContextBuilder AcrossContextBuilder.configurer(AcrossContextConfigurer... configurer)
      Add one or more AcrossContextConfigurer instances that are to be called after the initial AcrossContext has been created.
      AcrossContextBuilder AcrossContextBuilder.dataSource(DataSource dataSource)
      Set the core across datasource.
      AcrossContextBuilder AcrossContextBuilder.developmentMode(boolean developmentMode) 
      AcrossContextBuilder AcrossContextBuilder.installerDataSource(DataSource installerDataSource)
      Set the installer datasource.
      AcrossContextBuilder AcrossContextBuilder.moduleConfigurationPackageClasses(Class<?>... classes)
      Type-safe alternative for moduleConfigurationPackages(String...).
      AcrossContextBuilder AcrossContextBuilder.moduleConfigurationPackages(String... packageNames)
      Add one or more custom packages that should be scanned for ModuleConfiguration classes.
      AcrossContextBuilder AcrossContextBuilder.moduleDependencyResolver(ModuleDependencyResolver moduleDependencyResolver)
      Set the ModuleDependencyResolver that should be used for looking up modules by name.
      AcrossContextBuilder AcrossContextBuilder.modules(AcrossModule... modules)
      Array of AcrossModule instances to add to the context.
      AcrossContextBuilder AcrossContextBuilder.modules(String... moduleNames)
      Array of AcrossModule names that should be configured.
